content:
{"name": "Nourish up Prepared Meal Delivery", "alternate_name": "", "description": "All Nourish Up operations will be CLOSED on Saturday, May 24th and Monday May 26th, 2025 in observance of Memorial Day.
Delivering delicious, nutritious meals to your door through our Meals on Wheels program helps you stay healthy and comfortable at home. You’ll receive a prepared meal typically consisting of a protein, vegetable, starchy vegetable, fruit cup, and bread ready to heat and eat. Volunteers deliver meals Mondays through Fridays from 10 am to 1 pm, except on holidays. Meal costs are determined by a sliding scale (based on income, housing, and medical expenses) ranging between $1.00 and $5.00 per meal, as of 2025.

We can accommodate special nutrition requests:

Consistent Carbohydrate
Soft, Bland
Gluten-Free
Puree
Vegetarian
Modified Texture
Renal
Renal, Consistent Carbohydrate

Complete our online application: [https://nourishup.org/meals/prospective-recipient-referral-form-english/] or have a social worker, doctor’s office, or friend/family member refer you. If you need assistance filling out the form, contact us at (704) 523-4333. 

If you are filling in this form for yourself, write “Self” in the “Referred By” line below.", "email": "", "url": "https://nourishup.org/meals/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 523-4333", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}]}
